title: In the 1950\'s there was a grocery store on Market Street across from the entrance to Forest Hills.  The Rountree Law Firm is now on that site.  What was the name of that store and was any of the old building refurbished when that site was repurposed.  Was it Carney\'s?  What else has been on that site?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question about Carney's.
